TopicTitle: Should the forums just be wiped?

Articles.Content: It seems like there is more confusion caused by the extreme rollback especially with the mods section showing lots of outdated versions. It seems like a cleaner fix would be to just wipe the boards and have all of the mods that are still supported recreate their threads and all of the old threads in all forums go bye bye.

If this were just a forum of Mods then maybe.

But since Mods are only a fraction of the content, that would make no sense.

And how is there confusion when every post has a date stamp clearly visible in the top left corner?
no wipe needed. Just give it time, so long as you actually look at the dates, the old stuff will eventually settle to the bottom if people don't bump it.
I'm still laughing everytime I see a thread asking for docking.
